Text: Starting at episode 192 the subtitles are horrible. Nearly all of the dialogue is translated incorrectly, many of the sentences give absolutely no meaning. Looks like there's a new translator from there on and he has just tried to guess what they say based on a few words he recognice and what he sees.
Correction: Starting at episode 194 the subtitles are fine again. So for episode 192-193 I recommend watching without subtitles or switching to english audio if you don't understand much japanese.
